Constructor Detail

WebworkUtil

public WebworkUtil()
Constructor. Nothing initialized. Class used to capture information back from webwork using web-service functions. Should be used mostly from instructor context, other than for grading assignments, assigning set permissions for students.

Method Detail

resetDaily

                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException

Throws:

configChanged

public static boolean configChanged()

getAssignmentPoints

public static int getAssignmentPoints(java.lang.String courseName,
                                      java.lang.String setName)
Assignment points calculated by points factor (see config info) multiplied the problems in a set. This is the default assignment points. Instructor can change them in the assignments.jsp

Parameters:
courseName - Course Name in webwork for which the grade points should be retrieved.
setName - Set Name in webwork for which the grade points should be retrieved.
Returns:
integer value representing the total grade points for the Webwork assignment.
See Also:
- webworkAssignmentPointFactor.

writeChanges

public static boolean writeChanges(java.lang.String user,
                                   java.lang.String course,
                                   java.lang.String set,
                                   java.lang.String startDate,
                                   java.lang.String endDate,
                                   java.lang.String partialEndDate,
                                   int partialCredit)
                            throws java.text.ParseException
Method to write changes to the webwork server. Any changes like start date, end date, partial credit info, that is entered into blackboard either during the assigment creation in assignments.jsp or modified in modify.jsp has to be communicated to the webwork server, so that both these Db are in sync. Returns true if no excpetion. Method is synchronized so that the users don't mess up webwork Db.

Parameters:
course - Mandatory course name for which to write the changes.
user - Mandatory user name for whom to write the changes.
set - Mandatory course name for which to write the changes.
startDate - can be null or empty
endDate - can be null or empty, sets the answer date to be endDate in webwork.
partialEndDate - can be null or empty
partialCredit - can vary from 0 to 100.(0 - indicates not enabling partial credit)
Returns:
boolean indicating of success / failure
Throws:
java.text.ParseException - -- TODO

getWebworkAllCoursesList

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getWebworkAllCoursesList()
                                                                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Method to get List of webwork courses available in the webwork server. Note: This is a static method, and the list is refreshed everyday. This signifies that, if any changes in the webwork for the list of courses in a single day, it will only be reflected the next day.

Returns:
webworkAllCoursesList List of String representing courses available in the webwork server.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - Exception occurs when trying to get list of courses from the webwork server.

getBlackboardUser

public blackboard.data.user.User getBlackboardUser()
Blackboard user object, to recognize the user details, and write them to webwork database. This object is written into, through front-end in create.jsp

Returns:
the blackboardUser Object having the blackboard user information.

setBlackboardUser

public void setBlackboardUser(blackboard.data.user.User blackboardUser)
Method used to set the blackboard user object for this class. This method also creates a SOAP class permission record based on the user name. Thus, we need to set the blackboard user in this method, for professors /students, before they try to do something / access any class methods.

Parameters:
blackboardUser - the blackboardUser to set

getWebworkSOAPUser

public WebworkSOAPClassesUser getWebworkSOAPUser()
This method returns the WebworkUser details. Doesn't return back the webwork user details. Returns the Object created by the plugin.

Returns:
the webworkSOAPUser

setWebworkSOAPUser

public void setWebworkSOAPUser(WebworkSOAPClassesUser webworkSOAPUser)
Method creates a new WebworkUser with the blackboard user details. The user in webwork is created if the user doesn't exists. Constant comment info can be edited in the properties file. It is necessary to create a new object of WebworkSOAPClassesUser, as this method tries to set the object rather than create a new object.

Parameters:
webworkSOAPUser - the new Webwork user with details to set.

setSoapClassesPermission

public void setSoapClassesPermission(WebworkSOAPClassesPermission soapClassesPermission)
Method sets the class soapclasspermission object to the passed value.

Parameters:
soapClassesPermission - WebworkSOAPClassesPermission value to set.

getSoapClassesPermission

public WebworkSOAPClassesPermission getSoapClassesPermission()
Method returns the soapClassPermission object. Usually set, when the blackboard user object is set. See the setBlackboardUser method for details.

Returns:
the WebworkSOAPClassesPermission record.

setWebworkCourse

public void setWebworkCourse(java.lang.String webworkCourse)
Method sets the webworkCourse. Since, based on the webwork course, problems, sets and assigning the set to set objects change, these objects are initialized to null. This is due to the way, the get / set methods of other variables. Mostly they assign a value to the variable if the value of the variable is empty / null.

Parameters:
webworkCourse - String value representing a webwork course.

getWebworkCourse

public java.lang.String getWebworkCourse()
Method returns the course that the professor / student selected. See the set method for more details.

Returns:
String value representing a webwork course.

setWebworkCourseSet

public void setWebworkCourseSet(java.lang.String webworkCourseSet)
Method sets the set information of a course. Based on the set, the problems, grade etc. can be queried to webwork. Resetting the set info, we have to re-initialize the other variables. For more details on this see the doc on setWebworkCourse method.

Parameters:
webworkCourseSet - String value representing a webwork set.

getWebworkCourseSet

public java.lang.String getWebworkCourseSet()
Method returns the set info of a webwork course. See set method for details.

Returns:
String value representing a webwork set.

getWebworkCourseUsers

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getWebworkCourseUsers()
                                                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Method gets the list of course users available with webwork. If the user is not found in the list, we might have to create a new user / not allow the user to edit the course /set info etc.

Returns:
the webworkCourseUsers List of String providing userName of the users available with webwork.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - Exception occurs when trying to get list of course users from the webwork server.

getWebworkCoursesList

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getWebworkCoursesList()
                                                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Method which is used by the jsp's in the blackboard building block to get the list of courses, a professor / TA is allowed to access. Based on the search method enabled by the Configurations (Settings -> admin/config.jsp ) page of the building block, the list of courses are returned. All courses is a static variable, and this method, thus searches for a valid courses list for this user(who is accessing the plugin). Either checks the permission level of XX set through config page, or the user ID (any kind of verification parameter).

Returns:
the webworkCoursesList List of webwork courses valid for the current user(instructor)
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - Exception occurs when trying to get list of courses from the webwork server.

getWebworkCoursesSets

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getWebworkCoursesSets()
Method which returns the list of String containing the sets for a course. See the set method for details.

Returns:
the webworkCoursesSets

setWebworkCoursesSets

public void setWebworkCoursesSets(java.util.List<java.lang.String> webworkCourses)
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Method sets a list of set information based on list of webworkCourses passed. See the paramter is list of courses. Based on the courses, this method access the webwork and gets the list of available sets for each courses. Also this method adds the course name based on the set info. That is, for each course, list of sets are added to webworkCoursesSets variable, and for each set, the course name is added to the selectedWebworkCourses variable. See selectedWebworkCourses methods for details.

Parameters:
webworkCourses - Gets list of courses to set the sets for these courses
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - Exception occurs when trying to get list of sets for the courses from the webwork server.

setSelectedWebworkCourses

public void setSelectedWebworkCourses(java.util.List<java.lang.String> selectedWebworkCourses)
Sets the list of string of courses for each set information. Thus there is a one to one correspondence with this variable to that of webworkCoursesSets, which means for each variable in the set variable, there should be a corresponding course info available in this variable. Mostly used in the sets.jsp page.

Parameters:
selectedWebworkCourses - the selectedWebworkCourses to set

getSelectedWebworkCourses

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSelectedWebworkCourses()
Method returns the list of webwork course info. See the sets method, and variable doc involved for more details.

Returns:
the selectedWebworkCourses

setPublishWebworkAssignment

public void setPublishWebworkAssignment(boolean publishWebworkAssignment)
                                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Method usually called to set permissions, create user, and assign set to the user. Usually done when an assignment is published. Calls another set method - setCheckWebworkUserPermissions to do the request.

Parameters:
publishWebworkAssignment - the publishWebworkAssignment to set
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getPublishWebworkAssignment

Returns:
the checkWebworkUserPermissions

getCheckWebworkUserPermissions

public boolean getCheckWebworkUserPermissions()
Returns the value for checkWebworkUserPermissions variable. See the set method, for the functioning of the variable.

Returns:
the checkWebworkUserPermissions

setCheckWebworkUserPermissions

public void setCheckWebworkUserPermissions(boolean checkWebworkUserPermissions)
                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Method called twice usually - while creating assignments & during normal login to webwork. Called when plain list of webwork courses - without any search method is used. This method creates a webwork user, if one doesn't exist with the name of the current user & adds the set to the user, and creates a permission for normal access to the user. Care should be taken, as if the user is in instructor mode, this method might change the perm to student mode in webwork.

Parameters:
checkWebworkUserPermissions - the checkWebworkUserPermissions to set
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

setCreatePermissionsForUser

public void setCreatePermissionsForUser(boolean createPermissionsForUser)
Method checks if the permissions exist for the user in the webwork user. If not it will try to create one, and add & put_permission. Check logs for any exception. Be careful in using this method, as it might change the permission of an instructor to student, when called in irregular context.

Parameters:
createPermissionsForUser - the boolean attribute indicating whether the method needs to execute or not.

setCreateWebworkPassword

private void setCreateWebworkPassword(WebworkSOAPClassesPassword createWebworkPassword)
Method sets the password for the user. Need to apply in the future version. TODO method.

Parameters:
createWebworkPassword - the createWebworkPassword to set

setAssignSetToUser

public void setAssignSetToUser(boolean assignSetToUser)
Method which is used to assign a particular webwork set to the specified user(current user). The method checks if the user already has the permission, if not it will try to create one. The boolean attribute can be checked for the value passed, to know if the function execution is fine or not.

Parameters:
assignSetToUser - the boolean attribute indicating whether to assign the set or not.

setAssignSetToUser

private void setAssignSetToUser(java.lang.String userName)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Method is used to assign a specified user name to a set. This happens from the instructor context. Right now not implemented. Method is for future use only.

Parameters:
userName - - the String object of a user name which is to be passed.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - Exception which might be thrown if anything went wrong in webservice.

setAssignSetToAllCourseUsers

public void setAssignSetToAllCourseUsers(boolean assignSetToAllCourseUsers)
Method which assigns a boolean attribute assignSetToAllCourseUsers the value passed. For future use only. Method might be used by an instructor to assign all enrolled students in the blackboard to be assigned to a particular set in webwork. Not implemented right now.

Parameters:
assignSetToAllCourseUsers - the boolean attribute indicating, whether to assign all course users enrolled in the blackboard course to the webwork.

getAssignSetToAllCourseUsers

the assignSetToAllCourseUsers

getCalculateGrades

public boolean getCalculateGrades()
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Method sets the grades to webworkAssignmentGrades for list of webwork course users & grade points for each user. Also the grade point for the particular user is set to gradePoints variable.

Returns:
the calculateGrades boolean flag indicating
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

public void setGradePoints(int gradePoints)
Method which sets the grade of this user to a particular value. See the get method for more details.

Parameters:
gradePoints - the grade score value to set

getGradePoints

public int getGradePoints()
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Method retrieves the score of this user in the set and course. See the getCalculateGrades method for details on how the information is extracted.

Returns:
the gradePoints integer value representing grade score.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - while accessing webservice.

getWebworkCoursesAdmin

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getWebworkCoursesAdmin()
                                                                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Method is used for courses search of type 1 in webwork. This method searches for the username in a course like admin / some other course, where you have a list of courses for a particular user listed by - 'user_course_info' type. Method can be rewritten / configured for future changes. The method is configurable for the course to search on, which is in the config page.

Returns:
the webworkCoursesAdmin Map variable.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - while accessing webwork web-service.

getWebworkPermissionLevels

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getWebworkPermissionLevels()
                                                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Method gets a list of permission for this user for all courses available in the webwork. This method is used for searching webwork courses of type 2. Method checks for a permission level of 10(right now) or so, and assigns the course to a list of string specifying that the professor / student has the instructor permission for the course in the webwork.

Returns:
the webworkPermissionLevels String list containing permission level for instructor in each course.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - while accessing webwork web-service.
